meanings.definition: The way in which something is arranged or organized.
meanings.sent1: The setup of the classroom includes desks in rows facing the whiteboard.
meanings.sent2: She carefully checked the setup of the table before the party.
meanings.sent3: The setup of the board game was so confusing that we ended up playing a different game instead.
meanings.sent4: The setup of the garden was like a beautiful painting, with flowers arranged in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The setup of the museum exhibit made it easy for visitors to follow the historical timeline.

meanings.definition: The process of preparing something for use.
meanings.sent1: Before the event, the setup of the sound system took hours to complete.
meanings.sent2: The setup of the tent for camping was done efficiently by the experienced campers.
meanings.sent3: The setup of the picnic area was so quick that they had time to play a game of frisbee before lunch.
meanings.sent4: The setup of the stage for the play was like watching a well-coordinated dance.
meanings.sent5: The setup of the computer network was crucial for the office to function smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The setup for the surprise party involved coordinating with all the guests to arrive on time.
meanings.sent2: The setup for the project was detailed in the presentation slides.
meanings.sent3: The setup for the heist was so elaborate that it seemed like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent4: The setup for the marketing campaign was innovative and captured the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The setup for the road trip included mapping out the route and packing snacks for the journey.
